casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

April 17, 2013

[Cite as 0411712013 Case Announcements, 2013-Ohio-1523.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2013-0152. Bank of New York v. Elliot.

Cuyahoga App. Nos. 97506 and 98179, 2012-Ohio-5285. Upon consideration of the motion to stay an eviction on April 19, 2013, it is ordered by the court that the motion is denied as moot.
